title: How does one even Yasuo
body:
Like seriously.

Here's some of my amazing games with him over the past season
http://s15.postimg.org/jb89avkkr/yatardo.png
That one one for all game was against pantheon

After seeing these stellar score lines, you may be asking yourself "But Don, why don't you ever take him into ranked?"
Well, my good sir, the answer is simple. I have no idea what the hell I'm doing with this champion.

I've never had such a hard time picking up a champion and I have no idea why. He's the only champion that I continue to consistently feed relentlessly with.
